requirement.clarified:
Fix 7 issues in china-exchange-bucket-list-2026 HTML:
1. Display 'bucket_list' as 'Bucket List' (natural language)
2. Remove 'trip_style:' prefix in preferences display
3. Convert 'weekend_extended' to 'Extended Weekend'
4. Investigate Gaode Maps image quality (user reports wrong images)
5. Investigate missing POI images
6. Add z-index click handler for overlapping timeline items
7. Fix budget display - all budgets showing 0
requirement.what: Fix HTML display issues and budget calculation
requirement.why: User cannot see budgets, code values instead of natural language, and potential image quality issues

included: Fix budget calculation (convert ticket_price_eur to cost)
Natural language display for trip types

success_criteria: All budgets display correctly (non-zero where data exists)
Trip types show as natural language (Bucket List, Extended Weekend)
Timeline items can be brought to front on click
constraints: Maintain backward compatibility with beijing and china-feb plans

issue_7_budget.root_cause: HTML generator lost cost conversion logic when city_guides compatibility code was removed
issue_7_budget.root_cause_commit: 52d3528 - feat: unify skeleton format and regenerate HTML for all plans
issue_7_budget.why_introduced: Removed 134 lines of city_guides compatibility code including _merge_city_guide_data which had correct cost conversion
issue_7_budget.why_problematic: _merge_day_data only reads attr.get('cost', 0) but agent data uses ticket_price_eur, price_per_night_eur fields

issue_1_3_display.symptom: Code values like 'bucket_list', 'weekend_extended' shown in UI
issue_1_3_display.root_cause: No formatting function for trip_type values
issue_1_3_display.affected_code: React template displays raw trip_summary.trip_type value

issue_2_prefix.root_cause: Preferences string built from dict keys without filtering

issue_4_5_images.current_state: 52 POI images cached, need to verify quality and coverage

issue_6_timeline.symptom: Timeline items overlap, no z-index management

development_approach.strategy: Restore cost conversion logic from deleted _merge_city_guide_data, add natural language formatters, implement timeline z-index
